document_data.name: Timbrell
document_data.home: [[Womford]],<ref group="note">The town of [[Womford]] is not mentioned in the story, however, it was confirmed by [[Jeremy Lambert]] [https://www.instagram.com/p/CkOzi0HSKOd in his instagram post]. [[River Dessarin]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Timbrell''' was an older citizen of [[Womford]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Way Old Timbrell tells it, though...it's a wyvern monster in the bandit king's employ that done it. Fearsome thing hid up in the caverns there...|[[Mae]], speaking to rumors spread by Old Timbrell.}}
document_data.History: During the 1490s [[DR]],{{HAT-time}} the [[Pale Claw]] bandit gang took over the town of Womford and began stealing the wealth of all of its citizens. Old Timbrell believed that the terrible beast the bandits commanded was a terrible [[wyvern]]. Unbeknownst to Timbrell and other folks of Womforn, the Pale Claw was actually led by the terrible [[white dragon|white]] [[dracolich]] [[Glyrgoth]].
